Description: Ensures that each customer_id in tsb.customer_data_bank is unique, verifying the integrity of the primary key constraint.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Checks that there are no NULL values in the customer_id column, as required by the primary key constraint.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE customer_id IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where the full_name is missing (NULL), which may impact customer identification and communications.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE full_name IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where date_of_birth is missing (NULL), which may impact age calculations and compliance checks.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE date_of_birth IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where gender is missing (NULL), which may impact demographic analysis and reporting.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE gender IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where address is missing (NULL), which may impact customer correspondence and verification.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE address IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where phone_number is missing (NULL), which may impact customer contact and notifications.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE phone_number IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where email_address is missing (NULL), which may impact digital communication with customers.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where national_id_or_passport_number is missing (NULL), which may impact identity verification processes.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE national_id_or_passport_number IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where occupation is missing (NULL), which may impact customer profiling and risk assessment.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE occupation IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where customer_type is missing (NULL), which may impact segmentation and service eligibility.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE customer_type IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where account_numbers is missing (NULL), which may impact account linkage and transactions.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE account_numbers IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where age is missing (NULL), which may impact age-based analysis and compliance.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where created_by is missing (NULL), which may impact audit trails and accountability.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_by IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where created_on is missing (NULL), which may impact record creation tracking.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_on IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where modified_by is missing (NULL), which may impact audit trails for modifications.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_by IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where modified_on is missing (NULL), which may impact tracking of record updates.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_on IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where status is missing (NULL), which may impact workflow and customer state tracking.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE status IS NULL

Description: Checks for invalid age values (negative numbers), ensuring logical consistency for the age column.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age < 0

Description: Checks for date_of_birth values that are in the future, which would be invalid for a customer.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE date_of_birth > CURRENT_DATE

Description: Identifies phone_number values that contain non-numeric characters (excluding +, -, or spaces), which may indicate invalid entries.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND phone_number !~ '^[0-9+\\- ]+$'

Description: Identifies email_address values that do not match a basic email pattern, which may indicate invalid email addresses.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL AND email_address !~ '^[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+\\.[A-Za-z]{2,}$'

Description: Checks that gender values are within an expected set (e.g., Male, Female, Other, Unspecified).
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE gender IS NOT NULL AND gender NOT IN ('Male','Female','Other','Unspecified')

Description: Detects duplicate national_id_or_passport_number values, which should be unique for each customer for identity verification.
Custom_SQL: SELECT national_id_or_passport_number, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE national_id_or_passport_number IS NOT NULL GROUP BY national_id_or_passport_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Detects duplicate email_address values, which may indicate duplicate customer records or data entry errors.
Custom_SQL: SELECT email_address, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL GROUP BY email_address HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Checks for inconsistencies between the age column and the calculated age from date_of_birth.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age IS NOT NULL AND date_of_birth IS NOT NULL AND age <> EXTRACT(YEAR FROM age(CURRENT_DATE, date_of_birth))

Description: Checks that modified_on is not earlier than created_on, ensuring logical record modification history.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_on IS NOT NULL AND created_on IS NOT NULL AND modified_on < created_on

Description: Identifies account_numbers values that are empty strings, which may indicate missing account linkage.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE account_numbers = ''

Description: Checks that status values are within an expected set (e.g., Active, Inactive, Suspended, Closed).
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE status IS NOT NULL AND status NOT IN ('Active','Inactive','Suspended','Closed')

Description: Checks that customer_type values are within an expected set (e.g., Individual, Corporate, SME, Other).
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE customer_type IS NOT NULL AND customer_type NOT IN ('Individual','Corporate','SME','Other')
